name: b2connect-workspace
description: B2Connect - Full Stack Application with .NET Aspire Backend and Vue Frontend

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix Frontend/Store && npm install --prefix Frontend/Admin && npm install --prefix Frontend/Management
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm --prefix Frontend/Store run dev" "npm --prefix Frontend/Admin run dev" "npm --prefix Frontend/Management run dev" --names "Store,Admin,Tenant" --prefix name --kill-others-on-exit
